channel.title: Inverium Online
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i60.tinypic.com/21jssio.png[/img]
[url=http://www.inveriumonline.com][size=large]Website[/size][/url]
Inverium Online is a 317 Oldschool based RSPS that revolves around 2 basic things, PvP and the Economy. Our goal with this server is not to become the "#1 RSPS" or be know for "Perfection" but instead provide a experience that people enjoy playing daily.
[b]-Few Features-[/b] Amazing Combat System Ideal EXP Rates Classic PvP 99% Duel Arena Balanced & Rewarding Economy Bank Pin System OSRS Gameframe Updated Clan Chat 21 Fully Trainable Skills Perfect Switching Godwars Fun Barrows Pest Control Challenging Bosses Lightweight Cache for Instant Playing Kill/Death Ratio System & Pk Points Point Integrated Commands Dicing Custom Player Titles Guaranteed Lag Free Gameplay No BS Items or Customs
[b]-Some Media-[/b]
[img]http://i861.photobucket.com/albums/ab179/zyro746/shops.png[/img] [img]http://i861.photobucket.com/albums/ab179/zyro746/pvp.png[/img] [img]http://i861.photobucket.com/albums/ab179/zyro746/homepic.png[/img][/center]

This Server is amazing so everyone join now. The staff are amazing and the eco is steady. Bossing is awesome and drops often. Pking, Easy money making, etc. Have fun and join now!

Inverium Online is a 317 Oldschool based RSPS that revolves around 2 basic things, PvP and the Economy. Our goal with this server is not to become the “#1 RSPS” or be know for “Perfection” but instead provide a experience that people enjoy playing daily.
